metadata.dc:author: Granados Loarca, E A
Ambrosio Teni, V L
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of luxation of the testis in a 38-year-old male. The left testis, located at the inguinal region, was immediate closed reduction and after surgical orchidopexy.
metadata.dc:title: Luxación testicular. A propósito de un caso.
[Testicular luxation. Report of a case].
